entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rocky Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 07:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: SW 27 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches developing near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this morning then west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 2 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
